short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Collect text from any website and create notes for learning

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Learnium Chrome extension is the ultimate learning tool! With just a few clicks, you can highlight any information you want to memorize and create notes or questions to help you remember it better. Learnium then uses spaced repetition to send you notifications on your phone when it's time to repeat what you've learned. With Learnium, you can memorize anything faster and more effectively. Try it out today and see how easy learning can be!
